verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found my meaning in you
Your cause is the reason why I live
Your grace is teaching me how to give

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I give my whole life to you
Your love is the reason why I Sing
Jesus You are my everything

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Every night, every day, I don't need to wory - no, I celebrate
All the things You've done in me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And i'ts gonna be all right,
'Cause You are in my life
Yes it's gonna be all right
Gonna be, gonna be,
gonna be, gonna be all right
And i'ts gonna be all right,
'Cause Jesus, Youre my light
And You ahve shown me the way
All of my troubles, all of my life I give to you my king

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Gonna be, gonna be,
gonna be, gonna be all right
Gonna be, gonna be,
gonna be, gonna be all right
Gonna be, gonna be,
gonna be, gonna be all right
Gonna be, gonna be,
gonna be, gonna be all right
